Description: For the coolest guitars on eBay Be sure to visit the Guitars and Audio Stuff eBay Sales and Auctions You are bidding on a used 2002 Epiphone Les Paul Standard by Gibson This Epiphone Les Paul features a mahogany body with a maple cap and a maple neck with a 24.75" scale rosewood fingerboard with 22 frets and trapezoid inlays. The guitar has an Ebony finish. The electronics consist of 2 Standard humbucker pickups controlled by a 3 way switch and a volume control and tone control for each pickup. The knobs are vintage style amber colored top-hat models. The guitar has sealed Grover tuners with metal Kidney bean knobs. The tuner for the D string is a replacement. The bridge is a tune-o-matic with a stop tailpiece. The hardware has a Chrome finish. There are only minor marks on this guitar and it is in excellent near mint condition. The neck is straight and the truss rod can adjust the relief to your preference. There is no fretwear and no wear to the rosewood fingerboard. The electronics are all working as designed and quiet. This Les Paul is a great sounding guitar with classic styling in a classic color. A gigbag is included. Don't miss out. This item is used and sold as is. California residents add 7.75% state sales tax. Winning bidder pays for Fed Ex Ground Shipping delivery time 2 to 6 days Local pickup is allowed if you're in the Riverside, California area International shipping not available on this item due to restrictions on rosewood by the CITES Treaty. I will not undervalue the item to help you avoid Customs Fees. The USPS considers it a crime. Please don't ask. Once the item has left the United States I have no control over how it is handled or where it is sent. The Postal Service can only confirm that it has left the US. The buyer will need to contact their local Customs Agency or Postal Service if an item does not arrive with in the specified time. I will provide the buyer with the Customs Form Number and the Insurance Number if applicable. Sorry, no C.O.D.s. * NO TRADES!* I reserve the right to decline sale to bidders with excessive or unexplained negative feedback. However once it leaves my shipping department I have no control over how it is treated. I will do all I can to help you resolve any situations that arise as a result of shipping problems. Positive feedback will be left upon receipt of same Thanks for looking and good luck.
Title: 2002 Epihone Les Paul Standard Ebony Epi
